response.original_title: From The Other Side (Do Outro Lado)
response.overview: A nine-year-old boy who never crossed over to the other side of the road. For him, the other side looks like another planet. Arouses fear and admiration. Everything there looks beautiful, interesting, distant and very dangerous. Every day he sits on the edge of his side and watches the other side amid the danger of trucks passing by at full speed. Until something unexpected happens. A mysterious presence appears on the other side and change his destiny forever.
response.tagline: What you need to know to be able to cross to the other side of the road?
response.title: From The Other Side (Do Outro Lado)
